data.name: Last Mech Standing (Beta)
data.description:
Behemoths have invaded and flattened cities all over the world. Humanity is on the brink of extinction. You are the pilot of Crimson Slayer, the worldâ€™s largest and most powerful mech, and the last mech standing.
-----------
Notes: Last Mech Standing is currently in Open Beta (playable up to Stage 2).  Join the community on Discord - https://dsc.gg/lastmechstanding

Your feedback and insights are invaluable in shaping the game's development. Reach out directly to the creators and stay updated on the game's development!
-----------
Engage in intense battles against waves of monstrous Behemoths in this rogue-like game. As the skilled pilot of the Crimson Slayer, upgrade your weapons and mech to face increasingly challenging foes. 

Unravel the mystery behind the Behemoths' origins as you progress through each level, defeating powerful bosses and collecting rewards. 

Explore different fight styles, from pistols to melee, and unleash awesome firepower to become the ultimate defender against the monstrous threat.
